subject: Mental Health
title: Harm Reduction
description: Learn Harm Reduction in one minute.

hook.text: What if the goal isn't abstinence but keeping people alive until they're ready?

buildup.text: Harm reduction provides clean needles, naloxone, and safe consumption sites.

discovery.text: These programs reduce overdose deaths, HIV transmission, and emergency room visits.

twist.text: Critics say it enables drug use, but data consistently shows it saves lives.

climax.text: Meeting people where they are, not where you want them, is the core philosophy.

punchline.text: You can't recover if you don't survive.

quiz.question: What is the primary goal of harm reduction?
options: Keeping people alive until they're ready for recovery
